States:
¹Investigations are defined as the total number of open investigations at the end of the fiscal year.
²Recoveries are defined as the amount of money that defendants are required to pay as a result of a settlement, judgment, or prefiling settlement in criminal and civil cases and may not reflect actual
collections. Recoveries may involve cases that include participation by other Federal and State agencies.
Information in this chart was reported to OIG by the 50 State MFCUs, except MFCU Grant Expenditures and Total Medicaid Expenditures. MFCU Grant Expenditures and Total Medicaid Expenditures include
both Federal and State shares. Abuse/Neglect cases are defined to include "patient funds" cases.
All information is current as of January 31, 2014, except MFCU Grant Expenditures, which is current as of February 11, 2014.
